Name: Memoir
About the game: The emotional visual Novel that recalls the memories of his first love synopsis Jaeyoon created a programming club under the pretext of playing games at school. A new member of the club, which was scheduled to be abolished due to a lack of manpower, is introduced, reversing the tired daily life. Jae-yoon, who accepted Seo-ah that she just needed a quiet space, encounters various aspects of her defensive self. Meanwhile, Jae-yoon, who heard that Seo-ah could leave for Finland as an exchange student, realizes that the grace period is not that long. - Cute puzzle and Single ending - Heroine Full Voice Game - Playtime for 1-2 hours
